static float getLongestAxisSize(Vec2D v)
          Returns the longest axis' size (ie: 0.5f for Vec2D(0.2f, 0.5f))
static Vec2D getNormalized(Vec2D v)
          Returns a normalized vector to a max of 1 in either x or y axis
static Vec2D getNormalizer(Vec2D v)
          Returns a normalizing vector to scale the provided vector to a max of 1 in either x or y axis
static Vec2D getScalingCoef(Vec2D v)
          Returns a vector whose xy values are equals to the longest axis of the provided vector
static float getSmallestAxisSize(Vec2D v)
          Returns the smallest axis' size (ie: 0.1f for Vec2D(0.2f, 0.1f))
